content: This is such an accurate dissection of our relationship with technology, thank you for this! I like the point on how burnouts shouldn’t be worn as a badge of honour too. It does not make human sense. Yet despite knowing so, many of us are not breaking ourselves away from the pattern of letting technology take over our lives (talking about smart phones and our access to infinite knowledge) — because we are convinced we need it to be productive. I’ve only just begun my career and I am already experiencing the damage while convincing myself it’s a necessary sacrifice because I’m young and my energy (and sleep) is the only thing I can sacrifice in exchange for work experience. So thank you for this article Arianna Huffington, that’s a lot to think about!
